action_title: Introduce fishing gear exchange programmes to encourage fishers to use gear that reduces unwanted catch of mammals
key_messages:
Key Messages:

We found no studies that evaluated the effects of introducing fishing gear exchange programmes to encourage fishers to use gear that reduces unwanted catch of mammals on marine and freshwater mammal populations.

‘We found no studies’ means that we have not yet found any studies that have directly evaluated this action during our systematic journal and report searches. Therefore we have been unable to assess whether or not the action is effective or has any harmful impacts. Please get in touch if you know of such a study for this action.
